trustfund:
TF026712-PHRD-GHANA: PROMOTING
            PARTNERSHIPS WITH TRADITIONAL AUTHORITIES LIL

abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the Ghana Promoting
            Partnerships with Traditional Authorities Project were as
            follows: outcomes were moderately satisfactory, the risk to
            development outcome was moderate, the Bank performance was
            moderately satisfactory, and the Borrower performance was
            moderately satisfactory. Some lessons learned included:
            harmonization and integration of activities. This is a key
            to the success of projects of this kind is the recognition
            by the dual Governance system of the value of consistent
            joint policies and interventions. Also, in this project, it
            is evident that the resource base and management skills of
            the TAs were overestimated. Had the project preparation team
            paid attention to that, project design would have focused
            more on capacity development.
